context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n (PT/EN/ES) fully tested and working. PWA files accessible. Radar endpoints exist but require completed analyses to generate. The test user has analyses in 'created' and 'parsed' status but none in 'completed' status, so radar cannot be generated. To test radar generation, an analysis must go through all 5 steps: create → parse → generate → simulate → decide. Frontend language selector uses data-testid='language-selector' and individual buttons use data-testid='lang-pt', 'lang-en', 'lang-es'.
